sentences: In the conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2004/L.1), SBI welcomes the submission of initial national communications by 120 non-Annex I Parties and the submission of second national communications by three non-Annex I Parties.
SBI also welcomes information from the GEF on support for the preparation of initial and subsequent national communications and requests that the GEF continue these activities.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
